vue/array-bracket-spacing.name: vue/array-bracket-spacing
vue/array-bracket-spacing.description: 数组括号内保持间距，默认不加间距
vue/array-bracket-spacing.badExample: <template> <div v-for="i in [ 1, 2, 3 , 4 ]">{{i}}</div> </template>
vue/array-bracket-spacing.goodExample: <template> <div v-for="i in [1, 2, 3, 4]">{{ i }}</div> </template>

vue/arrow-spacing.name: vue/arrow-spacing
vue/arrow-spacing.description: 在箭头函数中，在箭头之前和之后执行一致的间距
vue/arrow-spacing.badExample: <template> <button @click="()=>{console.log(123)}" >{{i}}</button> </template>
vue/arrow-spacing.goodExample: <template> <button @click=" () => { console.log(123); } " > {{ i }} </button> </template>

vue/attribute-hyphenation.name: vue/attribute-hyphenation
vue/attribute-hyphenation.description: 限制自定义组件的属性风格
vue/attribute-hyphenation.badExample: <template> <MyComponent myProp="prop" /> </template>
vue/attribute-hyphenation.goodExample: <template> <MyComponent my-prop="prop" /> </template>

vue/attributes-order.name: vue/attributes-order
vue/attributes-order.description: 标签属性必须按规则排序
vue/attributes-order.badExample: <template> <div ref="header" v-for="item in items" v-once id="uniqueID" v-model="headerData" my-prop="prop" v-if="!visible" is="header" @click="functionCall" v-text="textContent" /> </template>
vue/attributes-order.goodExample: <template> <div is="header" v-for="item in items" v-if="!visible" v-once id="uniqueID" ref="header" v-model="headerData" my-prop="prop" @click="functionCall" v-text="textContent" /> </template>

vue/block-spacing.name: vue/block-spacing
vue/block-spacing.description: 块级作用域前后执行一致的间距
vue/block-spacing.badExample: <template> <div :attr="function foo() {return true;}" /> </template>
vue/block-spacing.goodExample: <template> <div :attr=" function foo() { return true; } " /> </template>

vue/brace-style.name: vue/brace-style
vue/brace-style.description: 对块级作用域执行一致的大括号样式
vue/brace-style.badExample: <template> <div :attr="function foo() {return true;}" /> </template>
vue/brace-style.goodExample: <template> <div :attr=" function foo() { return true; } " /> </template>

vue/camelcase.name: vue/camelcase
vue/camelcase.description: 变量名必须是 camelcase 风格的
vue/camelcase.badExample: <template> <div @click=" ($event) => { const { my_pref } = $event; } " /> </template>
vue/camelcase.goodExample: <template> <div @click=" ($event) => { const { myPref } = $event; } " /> </template>
vue/camelcase.reason: 很多 api 或文件名都不是 camelcase 风格的

vue/comma-dangle.name: vue/comma-dangle
vue/comma-dangle.badExample: <template> <button @click="() => fn([a, b, ])" ></button> </template>
vue/comma-dangle.goodExample: <template> <button @click="() => fn([a, b])"></button> </template>

vue/comment-directive.name: vue/comment-directive
vue/comment-directive.description: 支持在模版中使用 eslint-disable-next-line 等注释
vue/comment-directive.goodExample: <template> <!-- eslint-disable-next-line vue/eqeqeq --> <div :attr="foo == 1" /> </template>

vue/component-name-in-template-casing.name: vue/component-name-in-template-casing
vue/component-name-in-template-casing.description: 限制组件名的风格，默认使用大驼峰
vue/component-name-in-template-casing.badExample: <template> <cool-component /> <coolComponent /> <Cool-component /> </template> <script> export default { components: { CoolComponent, 'registered-in-kebab-case': VueComponent1, registeredInCamelCase: VueComponent2 } }; </script>
vue/component-name-in-template-casing.goodExample: <template> <!-- ✓ GOOD --> <CoolComponent /> <!-- ignore --> <UnregisteredComponent /> <unregistered-component /> <registered-in-kebab-case /> <registeredInCamelCase /> </template> <script> export default { components: { CoolComponent, 'registered-in-kebab-case': VueComponent1, registeredInCamelCase: VueComponent2 } }; </script>

vue/dot-location.name: vue/dot-location
vue/dot-location.description: `.` 之前之后保持一致的换行符
vue/dot-location.badExample: <template> <div :attr="foo. bar" /> <div :attr="foo .bar" /> </template>
vue/dot-location.goodExample: <template> <div :attr="foo.bar" /> <div :attr="foo.bar" /> </template>

vue/eqeqeq.name: vue/eqeqeq
vue/eqeqeq.description: 必须使用 === 或 !==，禁止使用 == 或 !=
vue/eqeqeq.badExample: <template> <div :attr="foo == 1" /> </template>
vue/eqeqeq.goodExample: <template> <div :attr="foo === 1" /> </template>

vue/html-closing-bracket-newline.name: vue/html-closing-bracket-newline
vue/html-closing-bracket-newline.description: 保持右尖括号跟前面的换行一致
vue/html-closing-bracket-newline.badExample: <template> <div id="foo" class="bar"> <div id="foo" class="bar"> </template>
vue/html-closing-bracket-newline.goodExample: <template> <div id="foo" class="bar"> <div id="foo" class="bar" > </template>

vue/html-closing-bracket-spacing.name: vue/html-closing-bracket-spacing
vue/html-closing-bracket-spacing.description: 保持标签的右尖括号前保持一样的间距
vue/html-closing-bracket-spacing.badExample: <template> <div > <div foo > <div foo="bar" > </div > <div/> <div foo/> <div foo="bar"/> </template>
vue/html-closing-bracket-spacing.goodExample: <template> <div> <div foo> <div foo="bar"> </div> <div /> <div foo /> <div foo="bar" /> </template>

vue/html-end-tags.name: vue/html-end-tags
vue/html-end-tags.description: 禁止标签缺少结束表示
vue/html-end-tags.badExample: <template> <div> <p> </template>
vue/html-end-tags.goodExample: <template> <div></div> <p></p> <p></p> <input /> <br /> </template>

vue/html-indent.name: vue/html-indent
vue/html-indent.description: 约束 template 内的缩进，默认为两个缩进
vue/html-indent.badExample: <template> <!-- ✗ BAD --> <div class="foo"> Hello. </div> </template>
vue/html-indent.goodExample: <template> <div class="foo"> Hello. </div> <div class="foo"> Hello. </div> <div class="foo" :foo="bar" > World. </div> <div id="a" class="b" :other-attr="{ aaa: 1, bbb: 2 }" @other-attr2=" foo(); bar(); " > {{ displayMessage }} </div> </template>

vue/html-quotes.name: vue/html-quotes
vue/html-quotes.description: 约束 html 中的引号, 默认为双引号
vue/html-quotes.badExample: <template> <img src="./logo.png" /> <img src=./logo.png> </template>
vue/html-quotes.goodExample: <template> <img src="./logo.png" /> </template>

vue/html-self-closing.name: vue/html-self-closing
vue/html-self-closing.badExample: <template> <div></div> <img /> <MyComponent></MyComponent> <svg><path d=""></path></svg> </template>
vue/html-self-closing.goodExample: <template> <div /> <img > <MyComponent /> <svg><path d="" /></svg> </template>

vue/jsx-uses-vars.name: vue/jsx-uses-vars
vue/jsx-uses-vars.description: 修复 no-unused-vars 不检查 jsx 的问题

vue/key-spacing.name: vue/key-spacing
vue/key-spacing.description: 在对象文字属性中强制键和值之间的间距一致
vue/key-spacing.badExample: <template> <div :attr="{a :1}" /> </template>
vue/key-spacing.goodExample: <template> <div :attr="{ a: 1 }" /> </template>

vue/keyword-spacing.name: vue/keyword-spacing
vue/keyword-spacing.description: 强制关键字前后的间距一致
vue/keyword-spacing.badExample: <template> <div @event=" if(foo) { //... }else if(bar) { //... }else{ //... } " /> </template>
vue/keyword-spacing.goodExample: <template> <div @event=" if (foo) { //... } else if (bar) { //... } else { //... } " /> </template>

vue/match-component-file-name.name: vue/match-component-file-name
vue/match-component-file-name.description: 组件名称必须和文件名一致
vue/match-component-file-name.goodExample: <script> // file name: src/MyComponent.jsx new Vue.componente({ /* ✓ GOOD */ name: 'MyComponent', render() { return <h1>Hello world</h1>; } }); // file name: src/MyComponent.jsx new Vue.componente({ /* ✓ GOOD */ name: 'my-component', render() { return <div />; } }); // file name: src/MyComponent.jsx /* no name property defined */ new Vue.componente({ render() { return <h1>Hello world</h1>; } }); //file name: src/MyComponent.vue new Vue.componente({ /* The default does not verify to `.vue`. */ name: 'MComponent', template: '<div />' }); </script>

vue/max-attributes-per-line.name: vue/max-attributes-per-line
vue/max-attributes-per-line.description: 控制一行可接受的属性量，默认是 1 个
vue/max-attributes-per-line.badExample: <template> <MyComponent lorem="1" ipsum="2" /> <MyComponent lorem="1" ipsum="2" /> <MyComponent lorem="1" ipsum="2" dolor="3" /> </template>
vue/max-attributes-per-line.goodExample: <template> <MyComponent lorem="1"/> <MyComponent lorem="1" ipsum="2" /> <MyComponent lorem="1" ipsum="2" dolor="3" /> </template>

vue/multiline-html-element-content-newli.name: vue/multiline-html-element-content-newline
vue/multiline-html-element-content-newli.description: 在多行元素之前和之后都需要换行符
vue/multiline-html-element-content-newli.badExample: <template> <!-- ✗ BAD --> <div>multiline content</div> <div attr >multiline start tag</div> <table><tr><td>multiline</td> <td>children</td></tr></table> <div><!-- multiline comment --></div> <div ></div> </template>
vue/multiline-html-element-content-newli.goodExample: <template> <div> multiline content </div> <pre> some content</pre > <div attr> multiline start tag </div> <table> <tr> <td>multiline</td> <td>children</td> </tr> </table> <div> <!-- multiline comment --> </div> <div></div> <div attr>singleline element</div> </template>

vue/mustache-interpolation-spacing.name: vue/mustache-interpolation-spacing
vue/mustache-interpolation-spacing.description: 强制 mustache 插值的统一间距
vue/mustache-interpolation-spacing.badExample: <template> <div>{{text}}</div> </template>
vue/mustache-interpolation-spacing.goodExample: <template> <div>{{ text }}</div> <div>{{ text }}</div><!-- Use vue/no-multi-spaces rule to disallow multiple spaces. --> </template>

vue/name-property-casing.name: vue/name-property-casing
vue/name-property-casing.description: 限制组件的 name 属性的值的风格
vue/name-property-casing.badExample: <script> export default { name: 'my-component' }; </script>
vue/name-property-casing.goodExample: <script> export default { name: 'MyComponent' }; </script>

vue/no-async-in-computed-properties.name: vue/no-async-in-computed-properties
vue/no-async-in-computed-properties.description: 计算属性禁止包含异步方法
vue/no-async-in-computed-properties.badExample: <script> export default { computed: { foo: async function() { return await someFunc(); }, bar() { return new Promise(); }, baz() { setTimeout(() => {}, 0); } } }; </script>
vue/no-async-in-computed-properties.goodExample: <script> export default { computed: { foo() { return someFunc(); } } }; </script>

vue/no-boolean-default.name: vue/no-boolean-default
vue/no-boolean-default.description: 禁止给布尔值 props 添加默认值
vue/no-boolean-default.badExample: <script> export default { props: { foo: { type: Boolean, default: true }, bar: { type: Boolean } } }; </script>
vue/no-boolean-default.goodExample: <script> export default { props: { foo: { type: Boolean }, bar: { type: Boolean } } }; </script>
vue/no-boolean-default.reason: 类型相关的约束交给 TypeScript

vue/no-deprecated-scope-attribute.name: vue/no-deprecated-scope-attribute
vue/no-deprecated-scope-attribute.description: 禁用已废弃的 scope 属性
vue/no-deprecated-scope-attribute.badExample: <template> <ListComponent> <template slot="name" scope="props"> {{ props.title }} </template> </ListComponent> </template>
vue/no-deprecated-scope-attribute.goodExample: <template> <ListComponent> <template v-slot:name="props"> {{ props.title }} </template> <template slot="name" slot-scope="props"> {{ props.title }} </template> </ListComponent> </template>

vue/no-dupe-keys.name: vue/no-dupe-keys
vue/no-dupe-keys.badExample: <script> export default { props: { foo: String }, computed: { foo: { get() {} } }, data: { foo: null }, methods: { foo() {} } }; </script>
vue/no-dupe-keys.goodExample: <script> export default { props: { foo1: String }, computed: { foo2: { get() {} } }, data: { foo3: null }, methods: { foo4() {} } }; </script>

vue/no-duplicate-attributes.name: vue/no-duplicate-attributes
vue/no-duplicate-attributes.badExample: <template> <MyComponent :foo="abc" foo="def" /> <MyComponent foo="abc" :foo="def" /> <MyComponent foo="abc" foo="def" /> <MyComponent :foo.a="abc" :foo.b="def" /> <MyComponent class="abc" class="def" /> </template>
vue/no-duplicate-attributes.goodExample: <template> <MyComponent :foo="abc" /> <MyComponent foo="abc" /> <MyComponent :foo.a="abc" /> <MyComponent class="abc" /> <MyComponent class="abc" :class="def" /> </template>

vue/no-empty-pattern.name: vue/no-empty-pattern
vue/no-empty-pattern.description: 禁止解构赋值中出现空 {} 或 []
vue/no-empty-pattern.badExample: <template> <div @click=" () => { const {} = foo; } " ></div> </template>
vue/no-empty-pattern.goodExample: <template> <div @click=" () => { const { bar } = foo; } " ></div> </template>

vue/no-multi-spaces.name: vue/no-multi-spaces
vue/no-multi-spaces.badExample: <template> <div class="foo" :style = "bar" /> <i :class="{ 'fa-angle-up' : isExpanded, 'fa-angle-down' : !isExpanded, }" /> </template>
vue/no-multi-spaces.goodExample: <template> <div class="foo" :style="bar" /> <i :class="{ 'fa-angle-up': isExpanded, 'fa-angle-down': !isExpanded }" /> </template>

vue/no-parsing-error.name: vue/no-parsing-error
vue/no-parsing-error.badExample: <template> <div>{{ message. }}</div> </template>
vue/no-parsing-error.goodExample: <template> <div>{{ message }}</div> </template>

vue/no-reserved-keys.name: vue/no-reserved-keys
vue/no-reserved-keys.badExample: <script> export default { props: { $el: String }, computed: { $on: { get() {} } }, data: { _foo: null }, methods: { $nextTick() {} } }; </script>
vue/no-reserved-keys.goodExample: <script> export default { props: { $element: String }, computed: { $listen: { get() {} } }, data: { foo: null }, methods: { $next() {} } }; </script>

vue/no-restricted-syntax.name: vue/no-restricted-syntax
vue/no-restricted-syntax.badExample: <template> <!-- ✘ BAD --> <div>{{ foo() }}</div> <div>{{ foo.bar() }}</div> <div>{{ foo().bar }}</div> </template>
vue/no-restricted-syntax.goodExample: <template> <!-- ✔ GOOD --> <div>{{ foo }}</div> <div>{{ foo.bar }}</div> </template>

vue/no-shared-component-data.name: vue/no-shared-component-data
vue/no-shared-component-data.description: 组件的 data 属性的值必须是一个函数
vue/no-shared-component-data.badExample: <script> Vue.component('some-comp', { data: { foo: 'bar' } }); export default { data: { foo: 'bar' } }; </script>
vue/no-shared-component-data.goodExample: <script> Vue.component('some-comp', { data: function() { return { foo: 'bar' }; } }); export default { data() { return { foo: 'bar' }; } }; </script>

vue/no-side-effects-in-computed-properti.name: vue/no-side-effects-in-computed-properties
vue/no-side-effects-in-computed-properti.description: 禁止在计算属性中对属性修改
vue/no-side-effects-in-computed-properti.badExample: <script> export default { computed: { fullName() { this.firstName = 'lorem'; // <- side effect return `${this.firstName} ${this.lastName}`; }, reversedArray() { return this.array.reverse(); // <- side effect - orginal array is being mutated } } }; </script>
vue/no-side-effects-in-computed-properti.goodExample: <script> export default { computed: { fullName() { return `${this.firstName} ${this.lastName}`; }, reversedArray() { return this.array.slice(0).reverse(); // .slice makes a copy of the array, instead of mutating the orginal } } }; </script>

vue/no-spaces-around-equal-signs-in-attr.name: vue/no-spaces-around-equal-signs-in-attribute
vue/no-spaces-around-equal-signs-in-attr.description: 属性中的 = 两边不允许使用空格
vue/no-spaces-around-equal-signs-in-attr.badExample: <template> <div class = "item"></div> </template>
vue/no-spaces-around-equal-signs-in-attr.goodExample: <template> <div class="item"></div> </template>

vue/no-template-key.name: vue/no-template-key
vue/no-template-key.description: 禁止 <template> 使用 key 属性
vue/no-template-key.badExample: <template> <div> <template key="foo"> ... </template> <template v-bind:key="bar"> ... </template> <template :key="baz"> ... </template> </div> </template>
vue/no-template-key.goodExample: <template> <div> <div key="foo">...</div> <template> ... </template> </div> </template>

vue/no-template-shadow.name: vue/no-template-shadow
vue/no-template-shadow.description: 模版中的变量名禁止与前一个作用域重名
vue/no-template-shadow.badExample: <template> <!-- ✗ BAD --> <div> <div v-for="k in 5"> <div v-for="k in 10"></div> <div slot-scope="{ k }"></div> </div> </div> <div v-for="l in 5"></div> </template> <script> export default { data() { return { l: false }; } }; </script>
vue/no-template-shadow.goodExample: <template> <div v-for="i in 5"></div> <div v-for="j in 5"></div> </template> <script> export default { data() { return { l: false }; } }; </script>

vue/no-textarea-mustache.name: vue/no-textarea-mustache
vue/no-textarea-mustache.description: 禁止在 <textarea> 中出现模版语法 {{message}}
vue/no-textarea-mustache.badExample: <template> <textarea>{{ message }}</textarea> </template>
vue/no-textarea-mustache.goodExample: <template> <textarea v-model="message" /> </template>

vue/no-unused-components.name: vue/no-unused-components
vue/no-unused-components.description: 禁止定义在 components 中的组件未使用
vue/no-unused-components.badExample: <script> import Foo from 'components/Foo.vue'; export default { components: { Foo } }; </script> <template> <Bar /> </template>
vue/no-unused-components.goodExample: <script> import Foo from 'components/Foo.vue'; export default { components: { Foo } }; </script> <template> <Foo /> </template>

vue/no-unused-vars.name: vue/no-unused-vars
vue/no-unused-vars.description: 模版中已定义的变量必须使用
vue/no-unused-vars.badExample: <template> <ul> <li v-for="item in items"> <span>Hello</span> </li> </ul> </template>
vue/no-unused-vars.goodExample: <template> <ul> <li v-for="item in items"> <span>Hello {{ item.message }}</span> </li> </ul> </template>

vue/no-use-v-if-with-v-for.name: vue/no-use-v-if-with-v-for
vue/no-use-v-if-with-v-for.description: 禁止在同一个元素上使用 v-if 和 v-for 指令
vue/no-use-v-if-with-v-for.badExample: <template> <div> <TodoItem v-if="complete" v-for="todo in todos" :todo="todo" /><!-- ↑ In this case, the `v-if` should be written on the wrapper element. --> <TodoItem v-for="todo in todos" v-if="todo.shown" :todo="todo" /><!-- ↑ In this case, the `v-for` list variable should be replace with a computed property that returns your filtered list. --> </div> </template>
vue/no-use-v-if-with-v-for.goodExample: <template> <div> <ul v-if="complete"> <TodoItem v-for="todo in todos" :todo="todo" /> </ul> <TodoItem v-for="todo in shownTodos" :todo="todo" /> </div> </template>

vue/no-v-html.name: vue/no-v-html
vue/no-v-html.badExample: <template> <div v-html="someHTML"></div> </template>
vue/no-v-html.goodExample: <template> <div>{{ someHTML }}</div> </template>

vue/object-curly-spacing.name: vue/object-curly-spacing
vue/object-curly-spacing.description: 强制括号内的间距一致
vue/object-curly-spacing.badExample: <template> <div :attr="{ a: 1 }"/> <div :attr="{ a: 1}" /> <div :attr="{a: 1 }" /> </template>
vue/object-curly-spacing.goodExample: <template> <div :attr="{a: 1}"/> <div :attr="{a: 1}" /> <div :attr="{a: 1}" /> </template>

vue/order-in-components.name: vue/order-in-components
vue/order-in-components.description: 组件的属性必须为一定的顺序
vue/order-in-components.badExample: <script> export default { data() { return { foo: 'Hello' }; }, props: { bar: Number }, name: 'World' }; </script>
vue/order-in-components.goodExample: <script> export default { name: 'World', props: { bar: Number }, data() { return { foo: 'Hello' }; } }; </script>

vue/prop-name-casing.name: vue/prop-name-casing
vue/prop-name-casing.badExample: <script> export default { props: { 'greeting-text': String, greeting_text: String } }; </script>
vue/prop-name-casing.goodExample: <script> export default { props: { greetingText: String } }; </script>

vue/require-component-is.name: vue/require-component-is
vue/require-component-is.badExample: <template> <component /> <component is="currentComponnet" /> </template>
vue/require-component-is.goodExample: <template> <component :is="currentComponnet" /> <component v-bind:is="currentComponnet" /> </template>

vue/require-default-prop.name: vue/require-default-prop
vue/require-default-prop.description: props 如果不是 required 的字段，必须有默认值（布尔值除外）
vue/require-default-prop.badExample: <script> export default { props: { e: Number, f: [Number, String], g: [Boolean, Number], j: { type: Number }, i: { type: Number, required: false } } }; </script>
vue/require-default-prop.goodExample: <script> export default { props: { a: { type: Number, required: true }, b: { type: Number, default: 0 }, c: { type: Number, default: 0, required: false }, d: { type: Boolean // Boolean is the only type that doesn't require default } } }; </script>
vue/require-default-prop.reason: 类型相关的约束交给 TypeScript

vue/require-direct-export.name: vue/require-direct-export
vue/require-direct-export.description: 必须直接使用 export default 导出组件
vue/require-direct-export.badExample: <script> const ComponentA = { name: 'ComponentA', data() { return { state: 1 }; } }; export default ComponentA; </script>
vue/require-direct-export.goodExample: <script> export default { name: 'ComponentA', data() { return { state: 1 }; } }; </script>

vue/require-prop-type-constructor.name: vue/require-prop-type-constructor
vue/require-prop-type-constructor.description: props 的取值必须是基本类型的构造函数，而不是字符串
vue/require-prop-type-constructor.badExample: <script> export default { props: { /* ✗ BAD */ myProp: 'Number', anotherProp: ['Number', 'String'], myFieldWithBadType: { type: 'Object', default: function() { return {}; } }, myOtherFieldWithBadType: { type: 'Number', default: 1 } } }; </script>
vue/require-prop-type-constructor.goodExample: <script> export default { props: { myProp: Number, anotherProp: [Number, String], myFieldWithBadType: { type: Object, default: function() { return {}; } }, myOtherFieldWithBadType: { type: Number, default: 1 } } }; </script>
vue/require-prop-type-constructor.reason: 类型相关的约束交给 TypeScript

vue/require-prop-types.name: vue/require-prop-types
vue/require-prop-types.badExample: <script> Vue.component('bar', { props: ['foo'] }); Vue.component('baz', { props: { foo: {} } }); </script>
vue/require-prop-types.goodExample: <script> Vue.component('foo', { props: { // Without options, just type reference foo: String, // With options with type field bar: { type: String, required: true }, // With options without type field but with validator field baz: { required: true, validator: function(value) { return value === null || (Array.isArray(value) && value.length > 0); } } } }); </script>
vue/require-prop-types.reason: 类型相关的约束交给 TypeScript

vue/require-render-return.name: vue/require-render-return
vue/require-render-return.description: render 函数必须有返回值
vue/require-render-return.badExample: <script> export default { render(h) { if (foo) { return h('div', foo); } } }; </script>
vue/require-render-return.goodExample: <script> export default { render(h) { return h('div', 'hello'); } }; </script>

vue/require-v-for-key.name: vue/require-v-for-key
vue/require-v-for-key.description: v-for 指令的元素必须有 v-bind:key
vue/require-v-for-key.badExample: <template> <div v-for="todo in todos" /> </template>
vue/require-v-for-key.goodExample: <template> <div v-for="todo in todos" :key="todo.id" /> </template>

vue/require-valid-default-prop.name: vue/require-valid-default-prop
vue/require-valid-default-prop.description: prop 的默认值必须匹配它的类型
vue/require-valid-default-prop.badExample: <script> export default { props: { propA: { type: String, default: {} }, propB: { type: String, default: [] }, propC: { type: Object, default: [] }, propD: { type: Array, default: [] }, propE: { type: Object, default: { message: 'hello' } } } }; </script>
vue/require-valid-default-prop.goodExample: <script> export default { props: { // basic type check (`null` means accept any type) propA: Number, // multiple possible types propB: [String, Number], // a number with default value propD: { type: Number, default: 100 }, // object/array defaults should be returned from a factory function propE: { type: Object, default() { return { message: 'hello' }; } }, propF: { type: Array, default() { return []; } } } }; </script>
vue/require-valid-default-prop.reason: 类型相关的约束交给 TypeScript

vue/return-in-computed-property.name: vue/return-in-computed-property
vue/return-in-computed-property.description: 计算属性必须有返回值
vue/return-in-computed-property.badExample: <script> export default { computed: { foo() { if (this.bar) { return this.bar; } } } }; </script>
vue/return-in-computed-property.goodExample: <script> export default { computed: { foo() { if (this.bar) { return this.bar; } return this.baz; } } }; </script>

vue/script-indent.name: vue/script-indent
vue/script-indent.description: 在 <script> 中执行一致的缩进
vue/script-indent.badExample: <script> let a = { foo: 1, bar: 2 } let b = { foo: 1, bar: 2 }, c = { foo: 1, bar: 2 } const d = { foo: 1, bar: 2 }, e = { foo: 1, bar: 2 } </script>
vue/script-indent.goodExample: <script> let a = { foo: 1, bar: 2 } let b = { foo: 1, bar: 2 }, c = { foo: 1, bar: 2 } const d = { foo: 1, bar: 2 }, e = { foo: 1, bar: 2 } </script>

vue/singleline-html-element-content-newl.name: vue/singleline-html-element-content-newline
vue/singleline-html-element-content-newl.description: 单行元素前后需要有空格
vue/singleline-html-element-content-newl.badExample: <template> <div attr>content</div> <tr attr><td>{{ data1 }}</td><td>{{ data2 }}</td></tr> <div attr><!-- comment --></div> </template>
vue/singleline-html-element-content-newl.goodExample: <template> <!-- ✓ GOOD --> <div attr> content </div> <tr attr> <td> {{ data1 }} </td> <td> {{ data2 }} </td> </tr> <div attr> <!-- comment --> </div> </template>

vue/space-infix-ops.name: vue/space-infix-ops
vue/space-infix-ops.description: 要求中缀操作符之间的间距
vue/space-infix-ops.badExample: <template> <div :attr="a+1" /> <div :attr="a?1 : 2" /> <div :attr="a ? 1:2" /> <div :[1+2]="1+2" /> </template>
vue/space-infix-ops.goodExample: <template> <div :attr="a + 1" /> <div :attr="a ? 1 : 2" /> <div :attr="a ? 1 : 2" /> <div :[1+2]="1 + 2" /> </template>

vue/space-unary-ops.name: vue/space-unary-ops
vue/space-unary-ops.description: 在一元运算符之前或之后执行一致的间距
vue/space-unary-ops.badExample: <template> <div :attr="- a" /> <div :attr="typeof(a)" /> <div :[typeof(a)]="typeof(a)" /> </template>
vue/space-unary-ops.goodExample: <template> <div :attr="-a" /> <div :attr="typeof a" /> <div :[typeof(a)]="typeof a" /> </template>

vue/this-in-template.name: vue/this-in-template
vue/this-in-template.badExample: <template> <a :href="this.url"> {{ this.text }} </a> </template>
vue/this-in-template.goodExample: <template> <a :href="url"> {{ text }} </a> </template>

vue/use-v-on-exact.name: vue/use-v-on-exact
vue/use-v-on-exact.description: 当一个节点上出现两个 v-on:click 时，其中一个必须为 exact
vue/use-v-on-exact.badExample: <template> <button v-on:click="foo" v-on:click.ctrl="foo"></button> </template>
vue/use-v-on-exact.goodExample: <template> <button v-on:click.exact="foo" v-on:click.ctrl="foo"></button> </template>

vue/v-bind-style.name: vue/v-bind-style
vue/v-bind-style.description: 使用缩写的 : 而不是 v-bind:
vue/v-bind-style.badExample: <template> <div v-bind:foo="bar" /> </template>
vue/v-bind-style.goodExample: <template> <div :foo="bar" /> <div v-bind="baz"></div> </template>

vue/v-on-function-call.name: vue/v-on-function-call
vue/v-on-function-call.description: 禁止在 v-on 的值中调用函数
vue/v-on-function-call.badExample: <template> <button v-on:click="closeModal()"> Close </button> </template>
vue/v-on-function-call.goodExample: <template> <button v-on:click="closeModal"> Close </button> </template>

vue/v-on-style.name: vue/v-on-style
vue/v-on-style.description: 使用缩写的 @click 而不是 v-on:click
vue/v-on-style.badExample: <template> <div v-on:click="foo" /> </template>
vue/v-on-style.goodExample: <template> <div @click="foo" /> </template>

vue/v-slot-style.name: vue/v-slot-style
vue/v-slot-style.description: 使用缩写的 #one 而不是 v-slot:one
vue/v-slot-style.badExample: <template> <my-component #default="data"> {{ data }} </my-component> <my-component> <template v-slot>content</template> <template v-slot:one>content</template> <template v-slot:two>content</template> </my-component> </template>
vue/v-slot-style.goodExample: <template> <my-component v-slot="data"> {{ data }} </my-component> <my-component> <template #default>content</template> <template #one>content</template> <template #two>content</template> </my-component> </template>

vue/valid-template-root.name: vue/valid-template-root
vue/valid-template-root.description: template 的根节点必须合法
vue/valid-template-root.badExample: <template> <div></div> <div></div> </template>
vue/valid-template-root.goodExample: <template> <div></div> </template>

vue/valid-v-bind.name: vue/valid-v-bind
vue/valid-v-bind.badExample: <template> <div> <div v-bind></div> <div :aaa></div> <div v-bind:aaa.bbb="foo"></div> </div> </template>
vue/valid-v-bind.goodExample: <template> <div> <div v-bind="foo"></div> <div v-bind:aaa="foo"></div> <div :aaa="foo"></div> <div :aaa.prop="foo"></div> </div> </template>

vue/valid-v-cloak.name: vue/valid-v-cloak
vue/valid-v-cloak.badExample: <template> <div v-cloak:aaa /> <div v-cloak.bbb /> <div v-cloak="ccc" /> </template>
vue/valid-v-cloak.goodExample: <template> <div v-cloak /> </template>

vue/valid-v-else.name: vue/valid-v-else
vue/valid-v-else.badExample: <template> <div v-else="foo" /> <div v-else:aaa /> <div v-else.bbb /> </template>
vue/valid-v-else.goodExample: <template> <div v-if="foo" /> <div v-else /> </template>

vue/valid-v-else-if.name: vue/valid-v-else-if
vue/valid-v-else-if.badExample: <template> <div v-else-if /> <div v-else-if:aaa="foo" /> <div v-else-if.bbb="foo" /> </template>
vue/valid-v-else-if.goodExample: <template> <div v-if="foo" /> <div v-else-if="bar" /> </template>

vue/valid-v-for.name: vue/valid-v-for
vue/valid-v-for.badExample: <template> <div v-for /> <div v-for:aaa="todo in todos" /> <div v-for.bbb="todo in todos" /> <div v-for="todo in todos" is="MyComponent" /> <MyComponent v-for="todo in todos" /> <MyComponent v-for="todo in todos" :key="foo" /> </template>
vue/valid-v-for.goodExample: <template> <div v-for="todo in todos" /> <MyComponent v-for="todo in todos" :key="todo.id" /> <div v-for="todo in todos" :is="MyComponent" :key="todo.id" /> </template>

vue/valid-v-html.name: vue/valid-v-html
vue/valid-v-html.badExample: <template> <div v-html /> <div v-html:aaa="foo" /> <div v-html.bbb="foo" /> </template>
vue/valid-v-html.goodExample: <template> <div v-html="foo" /> </template>

vue/valid-v-if.name: vue/valid-v-if
vue/valid-v-if.badExample: <template> <div v-if /> <div v-if:aaa="foo" /> <div v-if.bbb="foo" /> <div v-if="foo" v-else /> <div v-if="foo" v-else-if="bar" /> </template>
vue/valid-v-if.goodExample: <template> <div v-if="foo" /> <div v-else-if="bar" /> <div v-else /> </template>

vue/valid-v-model.name: vue/valid-v-model
vue/valid-v-model.badExample: <template> <input v-model /> <input v-model:aaa="foo" /> <input v-model.bbb="foo" /> <input v-model="foo + bar" /> <div v-model="foo" /> <div v-for="todo in todos"> <input v-model="todo" /> </div> </template>
vue/valid-v-model.goodExample: <template> <input v-model="foo" /> <input v-model.lazy="foo" /> <textarea v-model="foo" /> <MyComponent v-model="foo" /> <div v-for="todo in todos"> <input v-model="todo.name" /> </div> </template>

vue/valid-v-on.name: vue/valid-v-on
vue/valid-v-on.badExample: <template> <div v-on /> <div v-on:click /> <div v-on:click.aaa="foo" /> <div @click /> </template>
vue/valid-v-on.goodExample: <template> <div v-on="foo" /> <div v-on:click="foo" /> <div @click="foo" /> <div @click.left="foo" /> <div @click.prevent /> <div @click.stop /> </template>

vue/valid-v-once.name: vue/valid-v-once
vue/valid-v-once.badExample: <template> <div v-once:aaa /> <div v-once.bbb /> <div v-once="ccc" /> </template>
vue/valid-v-once.goodExample: <template> <div v-once /> </template>

vue/valid-v-pre.name: vue/valid-v-pre
vue/valid-v-pre.badExample: <template> <div v-pre:aaa /> <div v-pre.bbb /> <div v-pre="ccc" /> </template>
vue/valid-v-pre.goodExample: <template> <div v-pre /> </template>

vue/valid-v-show.name: vue/valid-v-show
vue/valid-v-show.badExample: <template> <div v-show /> <div v-show:aaa="foo" /> <div v-show.bbb="foo" /> </template>
vue/valid-v-show.goodExample: <template> <div v-show="foo" /> </template>

vue/valid-v-slot.name: vue/valid-v-slot
vue/valid-v-slot.badExample: <template> <div v-slot="data"> {{ data }} </div> <my-component v-slot:one="data"> {{ data }} </my-component> <my-component v-slot="data"> {{ data }} <template v-slot:one> one </template> </my-component> <div> <template v-slot:one> one </template> </div> </template>
vue/valid-v-slot.goodExample: <template> <my-component v-slot="data"> {{ data }} </my-component> <my-component> <template v-slot:default> default </template> <template v-slot:one> one </template> </my-component> </template>

vue/valid-v-text.name: vue/valid-v-text
vue/valid-v-text.badExample: <template> <div v-text /> <div v-text:aaa="foo" /> <div v-text.bbb="foo" /> </template>
vue/valid-v-text.goodExample: <template> <div v-text="foo" /> </template>
